title: BRIEF-Magna And Lyft Announce A Multi-Year Partnership To Develop And Manufacture Self-Driving Systems At Scale
text: March 14, 2018 / 9:19 PM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-Magna And Lyft Announce A Multi-Year Partnership To Develop And Manufacture Self-Driving Systems At Scale Reuters Staff March 14 (Reuters) - Magna International Inc: * MAGNA AND LYFT ANNOUNCE A MULTI-YEAR PARTNERSHIP TO DEVELOP AND MANUFACTURE SELF-DRIVING SYSTEMS AT SCALE * MAGNA INTERNATIONAL INC - IN ADDITION TO FUNDING PARTNERSHIP, MAGNA TO INVEST $200 MILLION IN LYFT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
